markdownRemark.html:
I could not stay away from the computer last weekend and yesterday I looked into the Oauth2 server code I have developed and deployed in the IBM Cloud.

I ended up implementing a data visualizer that uses appmetrics to monitor and display Node.js application data as a html web application.

You can see it live here:

I may write an article about it later.
